page.title: 03GEDNEY DYKE YOUTH CLUB
page.content: Every fortnight there is a Youth Club at Gedney Dyke Village Hall. The young children aged five to eleven go from half past six until eight o'clock. They play games such as Simon Says, Musical Bumps and Dead Dogs. They play records and can buy sweets and drinks at a counter. The older children, aged twelve to sixteen, go from eight o'clock until ten o'clock. They play snooker,darts and the girls dance together. The young children pay 25p and the older ones pay 30p. The Youth Club is run by volunteers who do not get paid. {
